description: Students read a variety of French literary texts. The course focuses on aspects of literary analysis, terminology, methodology, and literary history. Students develop critical skills through discussion and analytical writing. Taught in French. Prerequisite: FREN 232 or FREN 235, or equivalent.
name: Intro Literary Analy

revisions.prerequisites: Prerequisite: FREN 232 or FREN 235, or equivalent.

title: Introduction to Literary Analysis
